name: Barlow Sharp
article: React context is great when you are passing data that can be used in any component in your application. context api solve props drilling problem its amazing. when you pass data multiple laevels to a nested component. then you use context api. use context api easly pass data parent component to child component. Finally I can say context api assists in solving prop-drilling from all levels of your application.
title: what is purpose of context api ?
